event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1858

data.event: Leon was incorporated as a city in 1858.

event.title: January 15, 1888, a meeting of the business men of Leon was held

data.event: On January 15, 1888, a meeting of the business men of Leon was held at the Courthouse at which steps were taken towards organizing a business menâ€™s association.

event.title: existed successfully and helpfully for a number of years

data.event: The Board of Trade existed successfully and helpfully for a number of years.
